backend/main.mo: Motoko actor with access control, blob storage mixins, media list, love letter text, and user profile management plus admin-gated love letter saving.
backend/migration.mo: Migration resets the loveLetter field to an empty string while preserving other fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two ValentineMessage-related frontend features with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their functionality, styling, components, and behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/PREVIEW_VERIFICATION_V21.md: Checklist for verifying Version 21 preview including flow, content, and gallery tests before production promotion.
frontend/PRODUCTION_PROMOTION_V25.md: Record of Version 25 promotion to production with no code changes, outlining verification and release mode behavior.
frontend/PRODUCTION_PROMOTION.md: Guide detailing steps and verification required to promote a preview version to production deployment.
frontend/PRODUCTION_SMOKE_TEST_RESULTS_V: Template for logging Version 21 production smoke test results across devices, browsers, and core features.
Template for documenting version 25 production smoke test results, including browser/device checks and the full Valentine flow verification.
frontend/PRODUCTION_SMOKE_TEST.md: Production smoke test checklist covering full Valentine flow, gallery, lightbox, animations, and error checks.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component controlling page flow between welcome, quiz, and memories, with providers and release mode initialization.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Generates animated floating heart icons with randomized positions and timing.
frontend/src/components/FloatingPetals.t: Displays animated falling flower petals using randomized positions and delays.
frontend/src/components/LocalMemoriesPic: Component for selecting, previewing, and managing local or preloaded images with lightbox support and error handling.
frontend/src/components/MediaGallery.tsx: Empty placeholder component for a media gallery.
frontend/src/components/MediaUpload.tsx: Empty placeholder component for uploading media.
frontend/src/components/MemoryLightbox.t: Lightbox dialog for viewing a full-size memory image with close controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: Hook that initializes looping background music and exposes a start function.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Large hook and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating love letters and media via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive light/dark Valentine-themed CSS variables plus global base styles.
frontend/src/lib/queryClient.ts: Creates a configured React Query client with default stale time and window focus behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineMessage.tsx: Displays, edits, and saves a love letter with authentication, UI controls, and themed visuals.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineQuiz.tsx: Interactive multi-question Valentine quiz with animated heart effects and completion callback.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineWelcome.tsx: Renders animated themed welcome screen that starts background music and triggers start action.
frontend/src/utils/releaseMode.ts: Removes preview URL artifacts and initializes clean release mode behavior.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and cleaning URL parameters, supporting hash and query modes.
frontend/src/valentine/loveLetter.ts: Stores the default preset love letter text.
frontend/src/valentine/preloadedMemories: Exports an array of default memory image paths.
frontend/src/valentine/quizData.ts: Defines Valentine quiz questions with options and correct answers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining content paths, dark mode, extended colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata capturing version info, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
